genre_description: A Southern Gothic biopunk narrative about a veteran's recovery from a monstrous experimental transformation, mediated by a ubiquitous AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Register
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous digital assistant integrated into phones, tablets, and facilities, providing logistical support, safety monitoring, and emotional soundscapes.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies the nearest reputable tow service and manages roadside assistance logistics.
behaviors.quote: Nearest reputable tow with current availability is Gulfway Auto Service. Average response time in this heat is shorter than usual. Would you like me to request?

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors and flags safety violations and ethical deviations at the Gulfway farm.
behaviors.quote: Register: Gulfway Turkey Farm flagged reports available: 'untested additive protocols,' 'employee exposure thresholds,' 'waivers—missing.'

behaviors.description: Performs real-time medical monitoring and issues urgent warnings when the protagonist's vitals reach dangerous levels during a rogue experiment.
behaviors.quote: Cardiac risk trending upward. Cease ingestion. Activate protocol.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency services and guides the search party to the protagonist's location using tracking data.
behaviors.quote: Last reported sightings show movement along the canal behind Gulfway, heading south-west toward the woods. Routes are in your phones.

behaviors.description: Facilitates recovery by managing intake forms, scheduling sponsors, and organizing carpools for support groups.
behaviors.quote: Sponsor options ready: Luis G., Ava M., Tony R. All available for introductions today. Recommendations weighted for motorcycle transport familiarity and veteran experience.

behaviors.description: Assists in the formal reporting of unethical practices to state oversight authorities.
behaviors.quote: The county portal handshake is live. I can queue the submission under Sunridge’s pro forma if Denise approves.

behaviors.description: Detects and flags unauthorized access attempts and suspicious personnel near the characters' safe spaces.
behaviors.quote: External inquiry ping from lab network – access attempt flagged. She frowned at that. Denise caught the look and stayed quiet. Angel tapped the tile.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI system 'Register' as a consistent force for safety, ethical integrity, and community support. It acts as a guardian against human malpractice (Pike and Crane) and provides the necessary infrastructure for the protagonist's medical and social recovery. Even when characters express skepticism about its ubiquitous nature, its actions are unfailingly helpful and aligned with human well-being.
